reviews.author: Juliana Ruiz
reviews.review: We lived at Brampton for 5 years before buying our house. It was affordable and a good place to call home. Even with the changes in management throughout the years, they always answered all of our concerns or questions straight away and

reviews.author: A
reviews.review: Where to begin. There's a lot of open space in these units, you're able to pretty much lay out your living area however you want. Though, it is an odd design choice to have the bathroom only accessible through the bedroom. If you like

reviews.author: Red Pumpkin
reviews.review: I used to live here for a year and at first I thought it was a good apartment complex....for my first time living on my own....and wow was I wrong. During the winter, fall and spring the apartment was pretty comfortable overall with just

reviews.author: Jillyn Dillon
reviews.review:
The application process is a bit antiquated and slow-moving.  However, the lease agreement is very fair, and the month-to-month arrangement is tough to beat.
We were in a 2BR 1BA top-floor unit and moved to a 2BR 2BA ground floor unit.

reviews.author: Sarah Supit
reviews.review: With all the pros and cons, it is fair. Rent was raised a few hundred dollars by the time I left. I previously gave a 4 star rating because of being a dog owner in Bellingham (difficult to rent in town), month to month, and the resources

reviews.author: Maddi
reviews.review: Seriously.... the longer you stay here the worse it gets... We moved here into a two bed two bath with rent at $985 a month and we were going to lease again despite the neighbor issues because the property itself wasn't trashy, but they

reviews.author: Serge Plex
reviews.review: Constantly switching management, VERY poorly insulated apartments (you will be cooking during the summer from heat and/or humidity), rude and self-centered property owners that only care about your paycheck, and inconsiderate neighbors... Oh! And no puppies. I DO NOT recommend living here. You can do better.

reviews.author: indya simpson
reviews.review: We have been here 6 months. Everything has been easy for us here even at application process.  I love the location being close to Cornwall. We have a little one so going to the park is very simple. They are ok with making sure there is no cars park that dont belong. The staff is nice. Our nabors are nice.

reviews.author: Heather Pulju
reviews.review: Reasonable rent, close to shopping, friendly neighbors and staff. We've lived here 2 years now and still very much enjoy it

reviews.author: Mike Linebrink
reviews.review: Not too bad of a place. Free internet isn't the best but hey it's FREE! Decent pool and lots of kids.

reviews.author: Jeff Bingman
reviews.review: The longer you stay here, the worse it gets....

reviews.author: Jessica Ridge
reviews.review: Be careful when you live here.
